Detailed Description

Struct that defines a gdi sprite.

Field Documentation

uint8_t* _gdi_sprite::data

byte-array for sprite

  • 24-bit colored sprites: *data = { 8bit blue, 8bit green, 8bit red }
  • uncolored sprites: *data = 0 or 1 to draw a pixel with current color
